define: Retrieve the latest date of AMS dashboard data metrics update.
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Marker type. Applicable values: 

- AmsMarker: Used to query the data update date for metrics at the seller dimension.

- AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker: Used to query the data update date for metrics at the campaign dimension.

","name":"marker_type","sample":"AmsMarker","type":"string","required":"True","key":"RMhmdbx"}],"response_params":[{"description":"
